summary: Demonstrates an end‑to‑end workflow that feeds free‑form availability text to the OpenAI Mixtral model via the instructor library, parses the response into Pydantic‑defined date range objects, and utilizes datetime utilities for handling the resulting structured availability data.
business_intent: Illustrate how AI can automatically extract and structure human‑written availability information for scheduling, resource allocation, or calendar integration, enabling developers to embed natural‑language availability parsing into their applications.
